file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: ToDo list exam example
  version: 0.1.0
  title: ToDo list
paths:
  /api/toDoItems:
    get:
      summary: Gets a list of ToDo items
      operationId: getItems
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoItems'
    post:
      summary: Adds a new ToDo item
      operationId: addItem
      requestBody:
        description: Description of the ToDo item
        required: true
        content:
          text/plain:
            schema:
              type: string
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          headers:
            Location:
              description: URL where to retrieve the created ToDo item
              schema: 
                type: string
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoItem'
  /api/toDoItems/{id}:
    get:
      summary: Gets a ToDo item
      operationId: getItem
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the ToDo item
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoItem'
        '404':
          description: ToDo item with specified id does not exist
  /api/toDoItems/{id}/setDone:
    post:
      summary: Sets ToDo item to "done"
      operationId: setItemDone
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoItem'
        '404':
          description: ToDo item with specified id does not exist
components:
  schemas:
    ToDoItem:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        done:
          type: boolean
    ToDoItems:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDoItem'
